{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ts-7800-a2-large@2x.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = PC/104 Embedded Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.embeddedts.com/products/TS-7800 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Technologic_Systems_TS-7800 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Technologic Systems |model = TS-7800 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev E |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/24/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Technologic_Systems_TS-7800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F5182;MV88F5182; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 400 / 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Memphis;MEM5116D1CBTG-5; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1118; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:69
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Debian Linux;Sarge (3.1);;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, PC/104 bus, SD Card slot, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 2 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = 2-pin Molex
|serial = yes,, console port (DE-9),, (115200 8N1),, 4x RS-232,, 2x RS-485 |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, populated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, Micro SD Card slot, ADC, RTC w/ battery, temperature sensor, UART, GPIO, FPGA |addchip = RTC w/ NVSRAM;TI;BQ3287EAMT;;1;,,, FPGA w/ 12K LUTs;Lattice;ECP2-12;;1;,,, 5V RS232 Transceiver;Sipex;SP213E;;1;,,, 4-bit SPI Serial Flash;STMicro;M25P40;;1;,,, In-System Programmable PLD;Lattice Semi;LC4064ZC;;1;,,, 8-bit AVR Microcontroller with 8Kb Flash;Atmel;ATmega48;;1;,,, High-Performance RS232 Line Driver/Reciever;Sipex;SP202E;;1;,,, 0.8A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;1;,,, 1.5A Low-Voltage Current-Mode Synchronous PWM Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2012;;1;,,, High-Speed CMOS 10-Bit Bus Switch w/ FLow-Through Pinout;IDT;IDTQS3861;;2;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;2;,,, 100mA 30V Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;TI;LP2951;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor w/ SPI Interface;TI;TMP124;;1;,,, Dual Inverter Gate;TI;SN74LVC2G04;;2;,,, Reset Circuit;STMicro;STM1001;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2007 |estprice = 269 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5182 @500MHz *Storage: 512MB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.32GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR) SDRAM *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Network: 1x 1GbE port *Power Source: 5V/1A via 2-pin molex
==Links of Interest== ===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-7800 ''Board Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedTS ''Code Respository'']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Technologic Systems TS-7800 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-7800 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
